Events

Upcoming Events at Eastforest Homes

Bring Your Dog to Work Day

November 30th 2013: Bring your dogs into the office for the day!

Interior Decorating Session

November 1st 2013: Come to this free presentation by our interior designers on the latest fashions for your home!

Home Show 2013

October 10th 2013: Come to the annual Eastforest Homes Homeshow put on by the Design Studio!

Community Clean-up

October 1st 2013: Come out over lunch to help Eastforest clean up our community!

Walk for Breast Cancer

September 30th 2013: Come out and support breast cancer research!

Family BBQ

August 20th 2013: celebrate the end of summer and bring your families out to a BBQ at Eastforest!
